Pre-Game Insights: Orlando Magic (3-6) and New Orleans Pelicans (3-6) are set to face off on November 9, 2024.
The game will take place in Orlando, Florida.
Last season, the Magic finished with a record of 47-35, while the Pelicans finished with a record of 49-33.
The Magic averaged 110.5 points per game last season, while the Pelicans averaged 115.1 points per game.
Both teams struggled in the beginning of the 2024-24 season, with the Magic and Pelicans each having a record of 3-6.
